name: weather-mcp-server
description: Weather MCP Server for US National Weather Service data

scripts.dev: npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=debug PRETTY_LOGS=true node build/index.js
scripts.dev:trace: npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=trace PRETTY_LOGS=true DEBUG_MODE=true node build/index.js
scripts.inspector: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node build/index.js
scripts.inspector:debug: npm run build && LOG_LEVEL=debug PRETTY_LOGS=true npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node build/index.js
scripts.test:manual:alerts: npm run build && echo '{"method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"get-alerts","arguments":{"state":"CA"}}}' | node build/index.js
scripts.test:manual:forecast: npm run build && echo '{"method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"get-forecast","arguments":{"latitude":37.7749,"longitude":-122.4194}}}' | node build/index.js
scripts.test:manual:error: npm run build && echo '{"method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"get-alerts","arguments":{"state":"XX"}}}' | node build/index.js
scripts.test:manual:health: npm run build && echo '{"method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"health-check","arguments":{}}}' | node build/index.js
